title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.1.3 - Diligence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1200.1.3 - Diligence

State Regulations
(a) A lawyer shall act with reasonable diligence and promptness in representing a
client. (b) A lawyer
shall not neglect a legal matter entrusted to the lawyer. (c) A lawyer shall not
intentionally fail to carry out a contract of employment entered into with a
client for professional services, but the lawyer may withdraw as permitted
under these Rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1200.1.3. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
